movies.name: El padrino
movies.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.writers: Mario Puzo (screenplay by), Francis Ford Coppola (screenplay by)
movies.stars: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan

movies.name: Sue√±os de Libertad
movies.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.writers: Stephen King (short story 'Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption'), Frank Darabont (screenplay)
movies.stars: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton

movies.name: La lista de Schindler
movies.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.stars: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.stars: John Travolta, Uma Thurman, Samuel L. Jackson

movies.name: The Joker
movies.summary: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
movies.stars: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz

movies.name: Star Wars: El imperio contraataca
movies.summary: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.
movies.writers: Leigh Brackett (screenplay by), Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay by)
movies.stars: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher

movies.name: The Silent of The Lambs
movies.summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
movies.stars: Jodie Foster, Anthony Hopkins, Lawrence A. Bonney

movies.name: Volver al futuro
movies.summary: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
movies.stars: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

movies.name: Psycho
movies.summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
movies.writers: Joseph Stefano (screenplay by), Robert Bloch (based on the novel by)
movies.stars: Anthony Perkins, Janet Leigh, Vera Miles

movies.name: Whiplash
movies.summary: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.
movies.stars: Miles Teller, J.K. Simmons, Melissa Benoist
